title: Monitor Hydraulic Fracturing Job
description: A completions engineer at a remote center monitors a hydraulic fracturing (fracking) job in real-time to ensure it is executed as designed.

tasks.description: Display the real-time frac van data, including treating pressure, slurry rate, and proppant concentration.
tasks.expected_outcome: A live dashboard of the fracturing job parameters is active.

tasks.description: Compare the live treating pressure with the modeled pressure response to detect any deviations.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows the pressure is higher than modeled, indicating a potential screen-out.

tasks.description: Instruct the field crew to reduce proppant concentration immediately to avoid a screen-out and complete the stage.
tasks.expected_outcome: A command is sent and acknowledged, and the crew adjusts the job parameters.
